items.sentence: I didn\'t know why Tom was supposed to do that.
Why did you break up with your last girlfriend?
Why did you suddenly leave yesterday afternoon?
I\'ll let you know when we come to the station.
I\'d like to live in a French-speaking country.
What\'s Tom done with everything that was here?
What\'s Tom planning on doing after he retires?
What\'s the best way to get downtown from here?
What\'s the fastest way to get there from here?
Tom tried to sell the camera that he\'d stolen.
Tom didn\'t like Mary and she didn\'t like him.
Tom can\'t leave work today until six o\'clock.
Do you really think Tom is going to believe me?
Tom would like to know what\'s going to happen.
Tom wouldn\'t have left without saying goodbye.
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t want you to catch cold.
I\'m sure you understand why we can\'t do that.
I can\'t understand why Tom refused to help us.
Tom thinks Mary will never come back to Boston.
The President isn\'t willing to tell the truth.
